name: Bonbonribbon: Tokimeki Coord Kirakira Dance
storyline: In this game, Bonbonribbon teams up with Roonroonlulu, Milkeemimi and Lalalaflora to join a dance team known as the Lilybonbons and the gameplay is based on correctly coordinating the dance. Like Pompompurin: Korokoro Daibouken, the player is able to put photographs into frames featuring Bonbonribbon artwork.
summary:
A rhythm game where you can enjoy the coordination and dance of the fashionable dance team "Lily Bonbons".

In addition to the official song "Miracle Ribon", dance to well-known nursery rhymes and classic classics.
